caption: UPDATE: After the incident, management reached back out to me and corrected the individuals behavior. The fact that they cared enough to reach out to me shows the professionalism behind this company. Thank you so much for correcting this …
They had Great service really good Boba tea and nice workers I would recommend!
Got the mangonada. Totally recommend. So yummy and the staff is so friendly.
Super cute shop. Lots to choose from. I got the passion fruit tea with fruit jelly. Very tasty! The service was great!

This place closes at 9:30. Every time I come at 9 straight out of work they’re out of tapioca. Alwaaays. The drinks are good and it’s one of the closest boba shops near me and I like that they close later but what’s the point without tapioca balls.
Super super sweet even "without added sugar"... The fruit tea tasted just like syrup but maybe their milk tea is better
Very good
Not filled up all the way, and over priced. Ice overload. They also didn’t have any change. Don’t recommend.
This is our favorite local boba place! They have the BEST milk tea. The friendly staff and welcoming store all make the experience even better.
Tasted amazing and made me wanna move to Korea or Japan!
best Boba tea and customer service in Dallas Texas.
A great new experience
Never been there before, staff was very friendly and helpful. Tea was fast and tastes amazing. Definitely will be back to try more flavors
Beautifully Brewed and Flavorful Milk Teas - Meticulously Well Prepared Bobas and Jellies  - Wonderful Service - Enticing Punch Card Rewards - Crowded Waits on Weekends!

I was in the store a few days ago. I had not been there in a while. I had a punch card and had one last punch to make to a free one. I went to order a smoothie and was told i could not redeem my card for a smoothie. There was nothing on my …
Extremely friendly and patient staff. Cute decor and very tasty drinks. This will definitely be my regular drink place.
This place is cute and quaint.  Staff is awesome and the teas are Perfect!!!  I love the way you can customize what you want!!!
Cute, little place to grab some boba tea. They also have a variety of selections. My daughter really enjoyed it!
Great Tea. Dnt sleep in this
Boba was great. Service was alright.
Very nice place
Good customer service 👍 okay drinks! I would definitely recommend!

They made me feel really unwelcome on my 1st (now last) visit! From the nasty smell, to only 30 minutes of wifi, only 2 tables, no restroom, to the staff telling me to LEAVE if it gets busy (even though i was the only one in their store). …
The boba was like a burst of sunlight in my mouth.

No way to expecive, for size, plus no flavor at all omg I feel like a trash my money. If you really want a REAL BOBA TEA GO TO BISTRO B wow excellent price plus extremely rich flavor. Our smoothie was like water this is crazy
Really great customer service! Didn't know it was inside a restaurant instead of its own place so it was a bit hard to find but over all its a really great place!
Good place.  Very clean..great hospitality. 👍 The drinks are delicious

Excellent service, always so friendly. We spotted this place while dining in bishop arts. Probably returned 8-10 times. They offer a punch card!! Buy 10 boba 🧋 teas and get one free. We absolutely love this place. Great flavors, so many to choose from. You Gotta try!
This is the first time I try this place and this specific milk tea is the best very similar to something you’d expect from Starbucks!
(Translated by Google) LEMONBERRY BOBA IS THE BEST🦋✨🦋✨🦋✨🦋✨🦋✨  (Original) LEMONBERRY BOBA IS THE BEST🦋✨🦋✨🦋✨🦋✨🦋✨
Good smoothies and costumer service

I used to really like coming to Craft Boba, but in the last month I’ve come in and they’ve been out of Boba five times, all at different times. Being a business owner myself, this is inexcusable. Unfortunately I won’t ever return after …
Yummy. Excellent selection of different teas to handcraft your boba to your exact specifications.
Fruity bliss is now my FAVORITE! Its so freakishly yummy.😁 Vibe is awesome and great people with such great attitudes. I will be going there from now on since I work literally next door.
The tapioca boba was so hard and unflavored. I got a fruit tea that tasted my medicine. My first visit was pleasant, but after today, I will sadly not be returning.

We had the classic milk tea with aloe Vera jellies; while the jellies tasted authentic, we have had better flavored boba in the Dallas area. It is a fairly inviting place; however, not much seating is available.

Great service, clean & fresh! The girls work so hard and always seem to have a flurry of customers with a large variety of requests. Drinks are yummy. I love the almond milk tea with yogurt boba and salted cream 😋. Also a huge fan of the coco date smoothie! We really enjoy this  place for a good treat and great service.
Terrible macarons, after I had one I was sick all week, definitely it’s not a clean place.Ema was so rude, só really bad service.
Our drinks tasted like powdered licorice. Horrible milk teas. Do not drink here. Prize for worst boba I’ve had. Texture of boba is good but flavor horrible and teas undrinkable.
Ema & Diega, were both very helpful stayed late just to assist their customers.  I will definitely be back, these girls need a raise! Great work ethics!!

Overall the staff was nice however me and my buddy found our fruit teas to taste like water downed syrup with a soapy after taste. I legit believe that soap managed to get in there as a result we didn't even drink more than a sip (different …
Wow the employee today knows how to YELL! I’ve never had worse service or bad service from a bubble tea place but I guess it’s a first for everything. :)
WONDERFUL SERVICE LOVE U EMMA
Quality of their boba tea is not good. Tea is weak. They are stingy with the Tapioca. Cups are relatively small. Overall felt ripped off with the product.
Large selection, super delicious milk teas and toppings/boba. Bubble waffle is so good!!
Friendly and great service!!!

I love the drinks the people are really nice they take their time to explain the flavors and if you are new to boba i really reccomend thus place its a whole vibe its clean organized and asthetic i love it its amazing

If I find myself back on this side of Dallas, I'm going to this boba spot! It was so easy to mix and match different flavors, different boba, different pudding, different tea! One of my top boba places now, happy I stumbled on them after my meeting 👌🏼
Amazing drinks and amazing service. Nu was super nice and willing to allow samples of teas and bobas. They have yogurt popping boba! Very tasty. Fast and moderate price. New fav boba place.
Quick, yummy boba!! Will be back!
Really the best drinks ever. So many choices it's hard to decide which one you want to try next. If you never had Boba Tea this is the place to try first you will not be disappointed.

I tried and thoroughly enjoyed Craft Boba Tea last week, I will most definitely be back!!  Visited their Greenville (Caruth Haven) location Saturday afternoon and had a refreshing Boba Smoothie with Mango (AMAZINGLY GOOD)- the flavor was …
The mango  slush  was good  I get it when I go there
The boba here is so good and the people who work there are friendly. Also, the place is very clean.
Delicious!!! Loved the Peaches and Lychee!

When this place was Green Bar they had incredible smoothies. The Pineapple PB&J was the best smoothie I’ve ever had. Shockingly flavorful. Unfortunately since the Craft Boba team took over, they have the same smoothie menu but it seems …
Weak boba
I ordered the coconut milk tea slush and the taste was amazing! However, I’m sad to say that it was not completely blended. There were huge chunks of ice and I wasn’t able to enjoy the awesome taste.

I have been coming here quite a long time and I really love the quality of their tea.  However when I went in there was a new employee at the register wearing a mask that didn’t fit her well as it wasn’t right on her nose and it kept …

Love this place. Every time I come here they are very friendly. Their menu keeps getting better and better, and the quality of service and taste of the smoothies they make are always fantastic! If you live near the village and haven’t been here yet, you’re missing out.
Loved it! Very clean space, and variety of drink options
It was lovely,nice set up and the workers were so polite, would recommend
(Translated by Google) Excellent delicious  (Original) Excelente delicioso
The shop changed location since last year - this is what it currently looks like. Tea was good but the WiFi was temporarily not working.
(Translated by Google) Rikizimas drinks ... and variety of. Delicious flavors  (Original) Rikizimas bebidas...y variedad de. Deliciosos sabores

The menu was overwhelming when we first got in, as there were SO many choices to choose from, but when the cashier explained the menu, it became fairly easy to choose what type of boba tea to get. Would definitely go again--boba tea tasted good and staff was super helpful and nice.
Amazing service and the drinks are very good.
Everyone here is so friendly and helpful! I absolutely recommend!
Excellent! Extensive (!) menu, super helpful staff, delicious boba tea!
Wonderful craft teas and smoothies.   Really nice folks that remember your name.
SO GOOD. First time here, will be returning. I recommend the slushie taro bubble tea!

Had my first ever boba tea today at Craft Boba Tea. It was delicious! I had the Thai milk tea with regular boba (tapioca pearls) and it was super smooth, refreshing and not too chewy. (Having not had it before, I thought it'd be chewier …

They have everything you need in the Boba department, and super helpful behind the counter too.  Don't know what each Boba tastes like?  Get a sample.  Deciding between two teas?  Get a sample.  Cool stuff here.
They're fast at making your order and the drinks are delicious
It was so good, I have never had anything like it

I go here all the time and always receive a warn welcome. My favorite bobba tea place- i always get the fruit teas. I have also rdered their freshly pressed juices and are amazing as well. Always be my go-to place as long as live around here.
Love this place!! Can’t stop going there !! Everything  on the menu has excellent flavor and quality. The owner is amazing. The best of the best!

Owners are nice but, the milk tea Tastes like powdered of the flavor you pick( milk tea )which is something I absolutely hate it is not mixed well I will always choose panda tea which is down the street
I’ve been coming here for nearly a year now and along the way I’ve tried several other places but in my opinion none truly compare so I figured I might as well finally leave a review.

UPDATED REVIEW: I went back to Craft Boba Tea and the owner was very welcoming and let me try a few different flavors and bobas to see if I liked anything more than my previous flavor. He’s very good with people and cares about the …
The girls are always super nice here. I just wish the boba had more flavor.

Very cute tea shop! Plenty of seating as well. Their menu is huge with a great selection for any kind of mood! Those who are more health conscious, they have fresh pressed drinks and smoothies made from real fruit with no sugar added! My …
Yummy!!!! <3
Boba is well above par for the price! Large Thai tea for only $4.75 is a steal for the quality of it. Glad to finally have an awesome boba place in this part of Dallas.
My daughter's favorite boba place. Mine now, too. The owners are very knowledgeable and friendly and will take the time to help you with their large menu.

I tried my first tea at CBT yesterday and it was so refreshing! The price is dirt cheap for the quality of tea they use and A+ customer service! They really took the time to explain their products and craft it to your taste. Love their taste test option! Can’t wait to be back again!
Delicious drinks at reasonable prices with fast and friendly service . Mango passion burst is my fav!! Definitely recommend.

I went to craft boba at least 20 times when it was still location inside the restaurant it’s next to now, and the Thai tea was the best I had tried. Since they moved next door into their own space, they have changed their recipes and upped …

Their setup is really cute inside and the young ladies who work the register and make the Boba Tea are so sweet. Though I was not much of a fan for their Tea... it taste too much like milk for my tastebuds. I do reccomend that you give them …
Great spot for boba tea and fruit smoothies!

Save your money and go to another boba tea place. Man, I've never been so disappointed in a boba place until now..I went here 2 or 3 times just to be fair but Everytime I was utterly disappointed. I would never go back and would rather go to whole foods and buy some juice than this.

I came all the way from mesquite to literally try juice in a boba container.. but the staff was really nice, I’ll give them that! But the drink.. I felt super disappointed because I wanted Boba not juice I can get that at target..
Nice staff Tasty drinks

Best boba tea in the area and definitely the largest selection of milk teas. The tapioca is always good and when they're at the end of a batch they always ask if you want to wait a few minutes for fresh boba. My personal favorites are the …

I have been to this place several several times and by far my favorite place, I have tried several items from there menu and each item I have tried has been amazing. Definitely reccomend to try out!!!!

No boba in my tea. Bought three large teas none of them had sugar or tapioca pearls . Water and coloring but no flavor . Used to go there all the time but this is the last time I’ll be purchasing anything there . Ended up throwing all the teas in the garbage . Buyer beware
This place has very good bubble tea, with varied choices. It might be a little hard to find at first, but it is worth the search! Employees are so sweet and make you feel comfortable.
Best boba in Dallas. Super friendly staff, and of course great food and drinks! Love it here
Me server good, me get boba snow slush
Very nice and friendly customer service. I have Lemonade and boba tea in different location but this place is beyond my expectations.. love you guys

Location of this craft boba is inside of a Thai restaurant. As you arrive and go in you will be received with a warm welcome by the family owned business. They were very open to answer all of my questions and curiosity about their products. Additionally, they carry a reward system after being a faithful customer. Give this place a try.
Tucked inside Zaap Lao and Thai this Boba tea has lots of options and friendly staff
Literally water and milk with some boba at the bottom 😩 I’ve been craving boba tea and this was such a disappointment! Couldn’t even drink it, made me so sad. Like how do you mess up boba tea???
Amazing boba! Loved it!
the boba was AMAZING !! and the server was so nice 🥰 definitely recommend 🛸
Boba Tea + Restaurant

Great boba tea place on Greenville! It's a small stand inside the Zaap Lap & Thai Street Eats restaurant (I was confused at first, but you just walk into the restaurant and the Craft Boba stand is to the left in the corner). I ordered a …

OKAY, this is probably my new favorite boba destination! Other than the friendly service, and cute space, the drinks and boba are hands down the best. My boyfriend and I have been to several other places and definately agreed that this spot …
Teas and customer service were great! Waffles took a while to make and were just ok. We ordered the vanilla waffle with powdered sugar. The  waffles would probably taste better with other toppings.
Delicious drinks and GREAT customer service! I wish I lived closer so I could visit weekly. If you are visiting and looking for good boba then stop on by!
Always so friendly and speedy service! Tip: Located inside ZAAP KITCHEN.

Boba was good, and the waffles are excellent. The only issue is that there was only one employee running the stand, which requires them to take orders and prepare orders, and in our case there were 3 different parties requesting boba drinks …
Delicious boba tea and smoothies
All-around great experience, friendly owners and amazing drinks. Thai creme brulee is to die for.  I also did like their chai options. We will definetely go back and try all flavors.
Adorable family business just started, some of the best boba I’ve had. Shares a space with Zaap Thai restaurant.
Very friendly staff, and super delicious tea!!
Wonderful drinks and the créeme brûlée is delicious! They are very kinda and welcoming! Definitely recommend!
Super delicious my drink wasn't too sweet. I had the Kumquat Lemon with crystal boba. Very different drinks from other boba shops
Love their tea and the customer service was amazing!! Will be back!
